document.full_text: an undefeated female boxer from germany was shot in her dressing room by her stepfather before a title fight, leaving her with injuries to her hand, knee and feet.
document.title: female boxer shot by stepdad before bout in berlin
lines_and_colors: an undefeated female boxer from germany was shot in her dressing room by her stepfather before a title fight, leaving her with injuries to her hand, knee and feet.
